metadata.synopsis: Follow-up one-liner in the Gather Your Allies room in Endgame with one of the Unholy Assassins if we are Dark Urge. This one is a backup if Sarevok died.

0.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
0.text: Lead us on, my unholy liege, to slaughter on a scale the world has never seen.

1.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
1.text: Such misery awaits us. My fingers yearn to drag themselves through bloody flesh and make morsels of the masses in Bhaal's name.
1.context: NodeContext: 'misery' said with delight - this is a good thing, murder is the dream
